                                 String value,
                                 int elementValue,
                                 String path)
        Obtains the element value based on the input parameters.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        value - Indicates the attribute value of the element in the XML.
        value - Indicates the attribute value of the element in the resource file.
        path - Indicates the storage path of the element value resources.
        Returns:
        Returns the obtained element value.
